snippet.title: Irony Curtain: From Matryoshka with Love Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Preorder with a –10% off at GOG ⇨ https://bit.ly/307j0B6
Wishlist on Steam ⇨ https://goo.gl/HcBdoy

IRONY CURTAIN PREMIERE ON May 16th 2019

May 16th 2019 marks one of the most importantest events in the country of Matryoshka! The Great Leader will be celebrating his birthday – and for this reason, the Enlightened Father of the Nation has decided to bestow Irony Curtain: From Matryoshka with Love to the Matryoshkans! The game will be available on Steam and in preorder with a –10% at GOG !
